Development Plan

Fases Completadas (2024-2030):

Implementation Details

The TTBT2 project was developed in phases, with each phase building upon the previous one:

  1. Phase 1: Core System Development - Implemented evasion system with proxy rotation - Developed behavior logic for human-like interactions - Created plugin architecture for extensibility

  2. Phase 2: Plugin Ecosystem - Telegram plugin for remote control - Email notification system - AR plugin for 3D visualization - Voice NFT plugin with Whisper integration

  3. Phase 3: Blockchain Integration - Polygon NFT minting for plugins and rewards - Polkadot cross-chain functionality - DAO governance for community decisions

  4. Phase 4: AI Enhancement - Voice chat with Whisper and GPT-4 - Multilingual support for 5 languages - Automated testing and validation

  5. Phase 5: Infrastructure Scaling - Multi-cloud deployment (AWS, GCP, Azure) - Kubernetes orchestration - Auto-scaling based on demand
